getProcessors

public int getProcessors()
Description copied from interface: SocketSessionManager
Returns the number of worker threads assigned to perform socket I/O.

Specified by:
getProcessors in interface SocketSessionManager

setProcessors

public void setProcessors(int nProcessor)
Description copied from interface: SocketSessionManager
Sets the number of worker threads assigned to perform socket I/O. Decreasing this number won't stop threads immediately. It will not stop until all sessions assigned to it are closed.

Specified by:
setProcessors in interface SocketSessionManager
